title: Hecarim in the current meta
body:
{{champion:120}} 

I was waiting for the horseless headsman skin to be available before playing hecarim and now that I have it, I would like some advice

Is hecarim still worth playing in jungle today?

For reference, I mainly jungle with either  WW, Rengar, or Sejuani depending on what the team needs.  I am mid Gold.  How does he compare in efficacy against those heroes in the current LoL meta?
